mapper.select: SELECT dp.*, fp.fin_co_no, fp.fin_prdt_cd, fp.product_name as fin_prdt_nm, fp.kor_co_nm FROM deposit_product dp JOIN financial_product fp ON dp.product_id = fp.product_id WHERE fp.product_id = #{productId}
SELECT MIN(dp.min_deposit) FROM deposit_product dp JOIN financial_product fp ON dp.product_id = fp.product_id WHERE fp.category_id = #{categoryId}
SELECT MAX(COALESCE(dp.max_limit, 100000000)) FROM deposit_product dp JOIN financial_product fp ON dp.product_id = fp.product_id WHERE fp.category_id = #{categoryId}

SELECT DISTINCT do.save_trm FROM deposit_option do JOIN deposit_product dp ON do.product_id = dp.product_id JOIN financial_product fp ON dp.product_id = fp.product_id WHERE fp.category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY do.save_trm

SELECT DISTINCT do.intr_rate_type as "code", do.intr_rate_type_nm as "name" FROM deposit_option do JOIN deposit_product dp ON do.product_id = dp.product_id JOIN financial_product fp ON dp.product_id = fp.product_id WHERE fp.category_id = #{categoryId}
